scenes.label: *start
texts: A rumor like a fairy tale...
A drop of water on the surface of the lake that is the internet that spreads like a ripple.
A gentle breeze that caresses the calm waters, pushing them toward the shore so they can reach those in the real world.
"There's an anonymous genius painter who will paint anything you request."
It's less certain than an urban legend and more dubious than a magical charm.
Yet it's persistent enough to reach you in the real world through the massive void that is cyberspace.
The ripple spreads across your heart, and a picture begins to form in your mind's eye.
You go online and write up an email about the picture you want to request.
It's nothing but a tiny whisper in the back of your mind.
You don't expect anything to come from it.
It's sort of like the lotteryit would be amazing if you won, but you accept that the odds are very much not in your favor.
But still, what if you %i1did%id hit the jackpot?
But still, what if you did hit the jackpot?
But still, what if you did hit the jackpot?
That painting would be the best blessing imaginable. It would serve as a light, guiding you to a new life.
title: Opening
